faqItems.question: There's a feature or change I'd like, how can I suggest it?
faqItems.answer: For now - please use the 'Contact Support' button in the 'Help & Support' popup.

faqItems.question: How do I add a training session?
faqItems.answer: Click the "Add Training" button above the weeks calendar, or the + button on mobile, fill in the details including duration and elements, then save.

faqItems.question: How do I send my weekly report to my coach?
faqItems.answer: Click "Send to Coach" above the weeks calendar. For mobile, you'll see it in the menu button (☰) on the top right. Make sure you've added your coach's email in your profile settings first.

faqItems.question: Can I edit past training sessions?
faqItems.answer: Yes! Click on any training session to view details, then click the edit button to make changes.

faqItems.question: How do I upload a profile picture?
faqItems.answer: Go to your profile settings, click on your avatar, upload an image, and use the cropping tool to adjust it. For mobile, we're still fixing some bugs.

faqItems.question: I accidently sent my coach my report early or missing some training. What do I do?
faqItems.answer: Unfortunately, your coach will still get the email. So don’t spam them! You can always send it again but be aware that rate limits apply.

faqItems.question: Will this app always be free?
faqItems.answer: No. Due of the costs around development, hosting, and infrastructure, it’ll need to be paid at some point. That said, anyone I invite into the beta (you included) will have free access forever.
